short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically add ticket numbers to your task items.
Useful for project or task management web apps like Freedcamp or Asana.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily add auto-generated sequential ticket numbers to any text box. Works great for project management software like Freedcamp and Asana.

Works for teams or individuals. Now, use the context menu, or a keystroke to automatically add the ticket number!
